name: TUNNEL EDITOR
detailed_description:
The TUNNEL EDITOR is an in-depth level editor for the game TUNNEL DIVERS.

Create singleplayer (or co-op) missions, CTF or Dogfight maps, and show the world your level design skills by uploading your work to the Workshop.

LOGIC GATES
The TUNNEL EDITOR features the logic gate system. Logical flow allows you to easily create puzzles, traps and much more

WORKSHOP
Upload your level to the Workshop and have your friends access it with ease by downloading it from the in-game browser or simply joining a game server that is hosting the level file.

FLEXIBILITY
Set configuration options for your level, such as weather effects, starting weapons/ship and right down to what music from the soundtrack you want to play.

short_description: The TUNNEL EDITOR is an in-depth level editor for the game TUNNEL DIVERS.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
